item.title: Album of The Week: Bon Iver
item.author: Harrison Rickerby,
item.description: This is certainly the best album released so far this year, and it will probably remain that way unless Joanna Newsom sneaks out another before December. Often sounding very 80s with Peter Gabriel-esque synths on the opener ‘Perth’ and familiar pop-rock nuances on ‘Beth/Rest’, the album combines a …
